techmeme.title: Bengaluru-based FinBox, which provides B2B digital lending infrastructure, risk intelligence, and orchestration tools, raised a $40M Series B led by WestBridge (The Economic Times)
Airia, which is building a governance and orchestration layer for AI agents, raised $50M from its co-founder John Marshall, with an additional $50M commitment (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)
Scale AI signed a $100M ceiling contract with the DOD to provide end-to-end services, including its data engine for data preparation and AI model testing (Maria Curi/Axios)
Kuo: an OLED MacBook Pro with a touch screen is set to enter mass production by late 2026, while a cheaper MacBook with an iPhone chip will skip the touch panel (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
CrowdStrike: DeepSeek refuses to write code or produces less-secure code when English prompts say the code will be used by groups or regions disfavored by China (Joseph Menn/Washington Post)
